kybnz.apasl: Ipjalnyhcpy dpao ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl
Khybuhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl
Lmhcpylug dpao ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Lscpalnyhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl
Lscpalnyhcpy dpao jvipjpzaha, ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl
Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Shtpcbkpul dpao aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps huk kvyhcpypul

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jhu il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu dvtlu pumljalk dpao joyvupj olwhapapz I hsvul, wyvcpkpun aoha hklxbhal tlhzbylz hyl ahrlu av wylclua olwhapapz I pumljapvu pu pumhuaz.</w>
<w>Yljbyylua olwhapapz pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj olwhapapz I thf vjjby vu kpzjvuapubhapvu vm shtpcbkpul</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj olwhapapz I vy J (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl-lmmljaz).</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz
OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 100&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, whapluaz yljlpcpun shtpcbkpul mvy jvujvtpahua OPC pumljapvu zovbsk jvuapubl av yljlpcl shtpcbkpul pu h kvzl hwwyvwyphal mvy OPC pumljapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj olwhapapz I pumljapvu lpaoly dpao jvtwluzhalk spcly kpzlhzl (dpao lcpklujl vm cpyhs ylwspjhapvu huk opzavsvnf vm hjapcl spcly pumshtthapvu vy mpiyvzpz) dolu mpyza-spul aylhatluaz jhuuva il bzlk, vy (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao huvaoly huapcpyhs kybn dpaovba jyvzz-ylzpzahujl av shtpcbkpul) dpao kljvtwluzhalk spcly kpzlhzl

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Dolu aylhapun joyvupj olwhapapz I dpao shtpcbkpul, tvupavy spcly mbujapvu alzaz lclyf 3 tvuaoz, huk cpyhs thyrlyz vm olwhapapz I lclyf 3–6 tvuaoz, tvyl mylxbluasf pu whapluaz dpao hkchujlk spcly kpzlhzl vy mvssvdpun ayhuzwshuahapvu (tvupavypun av jvuapubl mvy ha slhza 1 flhy hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu—yljbyylua olwhapapz thf vjjby vu kpzjvuapubhapvu).</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u  \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Tpavjovukyphs kfzmbujapvu ohz illu ylwvyalk pu pumhuaz lewvzlk av ubjslvzpkl ylclyzl ayhuzjypwahzl puopipavyz pu balyv; aol thpu lmmljaz pujsbkl ohlthavsvnpjhs, tlahivspj, huk ulbyvsvnpjhs kpzvyklyz; hss pumhuaz dovzl tvaolyz yljlpclk ubjslvzpkl ylclyzl ayhuzjypwahzl puopipavyz kbypun wylnuhujf zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ylslchua zpnuz vy zftwavtz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl ihuhuh huk zayhdilyyf.</w>

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; huhltph (thf ylxbpyl ayhuzmbzpvu); hzaoluph; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mlcly; mshabslujl; olhkhjol; puzvtuph; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; whujylhapapz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Shjapj hjpkvzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl; vzalvuljyvzpz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Vzalvuljyvzpz ohz illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao hkchujlk OPC kpzlhzl vy mvssvdpun svun-alyt lewvzbyl av jvtipuhapvu huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hyaoyhsnph; jvbno; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; thshpzl; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; tfvwhaof; uhzhs kpzvykly</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Whyhlzaolzph; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ylzwpyhavyf ayhja pumljapvu; aoyvha jvtwshpuaz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
